ygData.subject: RE: Item Info Requests
ygData.msgSnippet: Man-o-war is paladin only.  no clue on mob drop. Spiritist hammer.  Yep.  Fearplane. Blue 2hander.  Quest.  Unsure of the details.  Only a few are in the game
ygData.messageBody:
Man-o-war is paladin only. no clue on mob drop.
Spiritist hammer. Yep. Fearplane.
Blue 2hander. Quest. Unsure of the details. Only a few are in the game
and they were handed down from GM's

Spoiler corrections....

The Alchemist drops the mammoth legs as common and cloak as rare.
The Archeologist drops the Archeologist pack as common and the dented brass
mask as rare

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:14 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQCheats] Item Info Requests
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Requesting info on where the following weapons (all 2H blunts) can be
> attained. IE. Zone, Mob, and level needed (or any parts you know).
>
> Dragonbone
>
> Man-O-War
>
> Spiritists Hammer (From the stats on this baby, I'll bet it's Fear
> Plane...)
>
> Any info on the GM given quest for Blued Two Handed Hammer as well.
>
> Hrm...spoilers.. Well, how about a mammoth cloak. Lots know where it is,
> in
> case ya don't, here ye be. Permafrost, goblin Alchemist, I believe he's
> behind a rock that acts like a door somewhere close to the preacher. He's
> roughly a 2 hour spawn I believe. Common drop is mammoth leggings, arch
> backpack (6 large slots, -25% weight), and his rare is Mammoth Cloak (VERY
> highly sought after item...). Buddy camped for 10+ hours the other night
> and
> never saw the cloak. Solo, 35th level, group, high 20s full group.
>
> -Leod
>
